name: Simple Sound
description:
The goal of this script is to play/stop sound effects from the Roll20 Jukebox via macro and chat commands.

Commands: `!splay trackname`, `!sstop trackname`, `!sstop`(stops all), `!swhisper`(toggle the GM whisper status)

See [Readme](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-api-scripts/blob/master/SimpleSound/Readme.md) for full instructions

[API:Simple Sound](https://app.roll20.net/forum/post/10593263/script-simple-sound)-forum thread
